column1: Art Institute of Chicago////At my last visit
column2: I spent about an hour with the impressionists and then had to rush through the remaining 1/3 because my time was short. I hiked through the European Art pre 1900s
column3: and eventually made my way to the contemporary galleries in the Modern Wing
column4: but only after taking a break at the Balcony Cafe
column5: which is basically another strategically placed gift shop that serves Intelligentsia coffee in little cups.
